p.k: Simon Oslender and Jérome Cardynaals have the jazz in their blood! Under the name 'Twogether' they celebrate a unique and soulful style of funky blues-jazz and work their instruments achieving a sound that leaves even renowned jazz artists speechless.
p.d: Instead of children's songs, the sound of jazz standards was always present. They practiced intricate drum rhythms instead of Bach etudes: Simon Oslender and Jérôme Cardynaals have jazz running through their veins! Under the name 'Twogether' both youngsters celebrate a very unique and soulful style of funky blues-jazz. They create a sound that leaves even renowned jazz artists speechless. The two, exceptionally talented boys met in a youth big band, and before long they became a musical team. Immediately after that, they won the first prize in the Prinses Christina Jazz Concours in Amsterdam, which got the whole thing started. In this concert, they perform with wonderful artists such as the Dutch saxophonist Benjamin Herman and the American vocalist Madeline Bell.
